Task description: Catalyst Hub is a playground/IDE for GraphQL requests. Also includes authorization/authentication capabilities, to give access to the tool to only to authorized users.
yuri: Created sign-up and sign-in forms, user authorization via Firebase. Set up RTK Query and Store to manage GraphQL API.
serj: Team and project manager. Pages routing setup. User interface design and styling pages.
irina: Configured i18next to manage project localization. Worked on sections of GraphQL editor.
